SELECT sm.msg_id, sm.msg_type, sm.user_no, su.user_name, date_format(sm.msg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as msg_date, sm.msg_detail, sm.talk_picture, su.user_avatar FROM sys_msg sm LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sm.user_no = su.user_no WHERE sm.msg_type = '论坛交流' ORDER BY sm.msg_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT sc.id, sc.msg_id, sc.user_no, su.user_name, sc.content, sc.comment_date FROM sys_comment sc LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sc.user_no = su.user_no WHERE msg_id = #{sc.msg_id} ORDER BY sc.comment_date DESC

SELECT sm.msg_id, sm.msg_type, sm.user_no, su.user_name, date_format(sm.msg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as msg_date, sm.msg_detail, sm.talk_picture, su.user_avatar FROM sys_msg sm LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sm.user_no = su.user_no WHERE sm.msg_type = '论坛交流'
and (sm.msg_detail like '%${content}%' or su.user_name like '%${content}%')
and sm.msg_date >= str_to_date(#{searchTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and sm.msg_date <= str_to_date(#{searchTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY sm.msg_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{page}
